role.argrole: person uttering the cries of joy

example.parse: (S (VP (PSEUDO_VERB ان) (NP-SBJ-1 (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC النساء)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FP كن) (VP (IV3FP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:FP يزغردن) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN استشهاد) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN فلذات) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FP هن)))) (NP-LOC (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC فوق) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ارض) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الجنوب)))))))))) (PUNC ,))

arg.g: for the martyrdom of their sons in the southern land
